RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 1 5F Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Claiming Purse 15000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 120 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000, if for $3,750, allowed 2 lbs. (*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEA MAJESTIC G G was away alertly, forced the pace on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch proved best. ALWAY'S ROSIE stalked the early leaders, was a factor on the turn and had a bid from the four path in mid stretch but was no match for the winner. COSMIC SHOT set a pressured pace and dueled on the turn but gave way at the top of the stretch. LIGHTNING MARIE was unhurried early and saved ground on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch was no threat. TEXAS DANA was off slow, showed little and from the four path at the top of the stretch had no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Alway's Rosie
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leaders, factor turn, bid 4-path stretch, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Cosmic Shot
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, dueled turn, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Texas Dana
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, showed little, 4-path stretch, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Lightning Marie
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, saved ground turn, 5-path stretch, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Bea Majestic G G
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, forced pace turn, 3-path str, proved best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 91. Claiming Purse 22200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $810 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUMMER RETREAT showed speed from the inside, had a slim lead on the turn, vied through the stretch and prevailed. STRIKING MOON was off slow, closed the gap on the turn and from the six path at the top of the stretch just missed. MONEY MATTERS was up close and dueled from between foes on the turn but was outfinished. VINNIE VAN GO was away alertly and a factor on the turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch leveled off. TWO YEAR CONTRACT was in range and roused on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch had no response.

ENTRY.NAME: Two Year Contract
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, roused turn, 4-path stretch, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Summer Retreat
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside, slim lead ruen, vied stretch, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Money Matters
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close, dueled between turn, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Vinnie Van Go
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, factor turn, 3-path stretch, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Striking Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, closed gap turn, 6-path stretch, just missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 24600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR RESTRICTED ALLOWANCE OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Since June 1 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $12,000, allowed 2 lbs. (*Plus Up To $4,725 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GIMBALA stalked the early leader, was a factor on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch drew clear. FOREST B set the pace and had the lead on the turn but was second best in a good effort. CHASING JOY was in touch and raced evenly on the turn but needed more. TOO MUCH VINO was off slow, trailed the field on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch rallied late. SILVER TUNES was in range but chased on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch was empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Forest B
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, lead turn, 2nd best, good effort

ENTRY.NAME: Too Much Vino
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, trailed turn, 4-path strech, rallied late

ENTRY.NAME: Gimbala
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, factor turn, 3-path stretch, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Chasing Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, evenly turn, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Tunes
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, chased turn, 3-path stretch, empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 54. Maiden Claiming Purse 21300. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 120 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Limited To 8 Starters)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed ina dvisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Five Furlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY SONG AND MELODY was away alertly, set the pace, had a clear lead on the turn and was much the best. TEQUILAS MELODY was hustled early and a factor on the turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch was no match for the winner. ONLY AT MIDNITE was unhurried early and moved up on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch leveled off. SAGED ENERGY was off the pace, saved ground on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch was up for a share. WICKEN CENTS was well back, trailed the field on the turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch passed tired foes. LIGHTS AND SIRENS was in touch and roused on the turn but had no response. TANGERINE TWIST stalked the early leader but lost ground on the turn and had nothing left. LADY OF THE FORT was in range but chased on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch was empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Lights and Sirens
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, roused turn, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Lady of the Fort
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, chased turn, 3-path stretch, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Saged Energy
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, saved ground turn, 4-path stretch, up for share

ENTRY.NAME: Only At Midnite
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, moved up turn, 4-path stretch, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Tangerine Twist
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, lost ground turn, nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Wicken Cents
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, trailed turn, 5-path stretch, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: My Song and Melody
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, clear lead turn, much the best

ENTRY.NAME: Tequilas Melody
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, factor turn, 3-path stretch, no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 5 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 15750. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,750, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CRUMLIN EXPERIENCE settled off the pace, moved up on the far turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch drew off. PARTY OF NO set a pressured pace, had a slim lead on the far turn and vied through the stretch but was second best. BOCELLI forced the pace and dueled on the far turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch was outfinished. THELONIOUS was off the pace and saved ground on the far turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch was no real threat. CALMING INFLUENCE was hustled early but lost ground on the far turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch failed to fire. DIMMI QUANDO had no speed and showed little in a dull effort.

ENTRY.NAME: Dimmi Quando
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, showed little, dull effort

ENTRY.NAME: Thelonious
ENTRY.OWNER: Centennial Farms (Niagara) Inc and Lennox John
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, saved ground far turn, 3-path stretch, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Party of No
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, slim lead far turn, vied stretch, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Bocelli
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced pace, dueled far turn, 3-path stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Calming Influence
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled, lost ground far turn, 3-path stretch, failed to fire

ENTRY.NAME: Crumlin Experience
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, moved up far turn, 5-path stretch, drew off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 68. Allowance Purse 24600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Since June 16 Allowed 2 lbs. (*Plus Up To $4,725 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awa rds).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SNEAKY REBEL set the pace, had a clear lead on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch was kept to task. MIMI'S HOLIDAY was unhurried early, roused from the inside on the turn and from the three path through the stretch was up for place. LOVE MY CHERYL tracked the early leader and had a good position on the turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch had no late kick. ISA BREEZE was off the pace, trailed the field on the turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch was not a factor. MISS MOLLY LALOU was in touch and raced evenly on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch had no rally.

ENTRY.NAME: Sneaky Rebel
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, clear lead turn, 3-path stretch, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Mimi's Holiday
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, roused inside turn, 3-path stretch, up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Love My Cheryl
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader, good position turn, 3-path stretch, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Isa Breeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, trailed turn, 5-path stretch, not a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Molly Lalou
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, evenly turn, 4-path stretch, no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 7 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 22200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(Limited To 8 Starters)(*Plus Up To $810 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Six and One Half Furlongs on t he main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JACK BEANSTALK set the pace, had a clear lead on the turn and with mild pressure through the stretch held sway. LIL GREEN MACHINE was in touch, raced evenly on the turn and was up for place. PAPERBACK HERO tracked the early leader and was a factor on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch needed more. HADDASSAH'S DEVIL stumbled at the start and closed the gap on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch had no impact. ROCKET JOE COPPER was unhurried early but chased on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Green Machine
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, evenly turn, up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Jack Beanstalk
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, clear lead urn, mild pressure stretch, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Haddassah's Devil
ENTRY.OWNER: Catalano Gerard Gnozzo Victor A and Davis Richard M
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, closed gap turn, 5-path stretch, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Paperback Hero
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader, factor turn, 4-path stretch, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Rocket Joe Copper
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, chased turn, 3-path stretch, not a factor
